name: Drifting Stone
description:
Do you enjoy ducks and drakes? Do you want skip stones to jump more on the water?
Jump as fast as you can! Don't fall in the water!

Easy to play but hard to master gameplay means you’ll be coming back again and again for one more drifting.

HOW TO PLAY:
-Tap screen to throw out the stone.
-When the stone is near the surface of the water, tap screen and make bounce.
-When approaching the surface, tap again.
-Easy to play.
-How many score you can get?

Game features.
-Free to play
-Endless gameplay
-One-button gameplay
-Fun, fast physics
-Easy to learn, hard to master
-Earn in-game currency to buy new stone
-Global rankings.

If you love the game. Give us your feedback: https://www.facebook.com/tutappgames
